dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, um, normally, air gets cooler as you go higher. Right? Like, you know, on a mountain.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, um, normally, air gets cooler as you go higher. Right? Like, you know, on a mountain.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. But an inversion is when it's the opposite. A layer of warmer air, uh, actually sits above cooler air closer to the ground.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. But an inversion is when it's the opposite. A layer of warmer air, uh, actually sits above cooler air closer to the ground.
